description: Quick, easy and full of veggies.  Serves 4 as a side dish.
keywords: Salads,Zucchini,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Low kilojoule,Tomato,Low sugar,Low fat
name: Zucchini & Cherry Tomato Warm Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp mixed dried herbs (or fresh basil)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the vegetables: Chop the onion and garlic. Cut each zucchini in half lengthwise and then cut across into thick half moons
Over medium heat, spray pan and cook onions, while stirring, until soft but don't brown.

Add zucchinis, cherry tomatoes, garlic, herbs and pepper to onions in the pan and mix. Cook over medium heat while gently stirring from time to time for about 5-6 minutes. The tomatoes should start to blister and the zucchini should cook through but don't let the zucchini get too soft. You want it cooked but firm.
If using fresh basil instead of dried herbs, add just before serving. Grate or shave some parmesan cheese over the top to serve.
